basic.description:
Mechanistically oriented study of organic reactions with emphasis on applications to synthesis. The laboratory affords experience in organic synthesis. Winter Term.
LEARNING HOURS    144 (36L;36Lb;72P)
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Organic Reactions

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   CHEM211 & CHEM212
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from CHEM223; CHEM282; CHEM285.
